text: Frightwig is an American punk rock band. It was founded in 1982. All of the members are women. They are feminists. Deanna Ashley and Mia Levin started the band in San Francisco. In 1984, they released their first album Cat Farm Faboo. In 1986, their second album was released. In 1993 they released an extended play called Phone Sexy. In 1994 the band broke up. The band got back together in 2012. ==References== Category:1980s American music groups Category:1982 establishments in California Category:1990s American music groups Category:2010s American music groups Category:American feminists Category:American punk bands Category:Musical groups established in 1982 Category:Musical groups from San Francisco
title: Frightwig
